application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Discharge of Condition 3 (Construction Logistics Plan) and Condition 5 (Boundary Treatment) of Planning Permission ref: 19/01464/FUL (Demolish existing single storey flat to rear of 75 and 77 Park Road (Class C3(a)) and erection of 2 storey residential flat with private external terrace (Class C3(a)) )
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satify the requirements of Condition 3 (Construction Logistics Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 5 (Boundary Treatment). Therefore, the proposal would fail to ensure the preservation of visual amenity and the character of the area.
